name: Anno 1800 - Pedestrian Zone Pack
description:
The 4th cosmetic pack of Anno 1800.

Pedestrian Zone Pack adds 22 new ornaments that allow you to bring your bustling cities to life like never before:

Create magnificent canal systems and bridges for your residents to enjoy.

Tailor your plazas and squares to your liking with new tile variations.

New pedestrian bridges and underground entrances add more verticality to your pedestrian zones.

Use ornaments like the pavilion and the market hall to enhance the feeling of a busy pedestrian street.
